title: Amazing apple muffins
ingredients: ['75g margarine', '250g self-raising flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '3/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 pinch salt', '115g light brown soft sugar', '2 medium eggs', '125ml milk (semi-skimmed is fine)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 Cox or Braeburn apples, grated', '1 tablespoon honey']
